txt_en: Love is like quicksilver in the hand. Leave the fingers open and it stays. Clutch it and it darts away.
txt_cn: 爱情就如手中的水银。张开手指，它就留在手中；一旦攥紧，它就飞快离开。
author: Dorothy Parker

txt_en: Pure love and suspicion cannot dwell together: at the door where the latter enters, the former makes its exit.
txt_cn: 纯洁的爱情和猜疑水火不容：起了疑心，就会丢了爱情。
author: Alexandre Dumas

txt_en: Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.
txt_cn: 相比斗篷，爱情更能驱走寒冷。
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

txt_en: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
txt_cn: 你想知道自己是什么样的人？不要去追问，行动起来！行动会描绘和定义你的模样。
author: Thomas Jefferson

txt_en: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
txt_cn: 耐心、坚持和汗水是取得成功的无敌组合。
author: Napoleon Hill

txt_en: May the odds be ever in your favor.
author: 《饥饿游戏》

txt_en: The ones who love us never really leave us; you can always find them in here.
txt_cn: 爱我们的人永远不会真正离开，他们会一直存在你的心里。
author: 《哈利·波特与阿兹卡班的囚徒》

txt_en: It's you, on your own, picking up the pieces and starting over.
txt_cn: 凭借你自己的力量，捡起碎片，从头再来。
author: 《他其实没那么喜欢你》

txt_en: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.
txt_cn: 做我们自己，并成为我们所能成为的人，是人生唯一的目的。
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
